crank.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a handle on a piece of equipment, that you can turn in order to move something
crank.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who has unusual ideas and behaves strangely
crank.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Zoff was originally dismissed as a crank, but his theories later became very influential.
crank.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: someone who easily gets angry or annoyed with people
crank.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make something move by turning a crank
